item.title: Initial commit
item.description: Blog efficently - workflow for writing in public with ease. Setup My requirements are: 1. Control the whole process from the command line 2. Write in markdown 3. A very fast site 4. No manual management over servers 5. Custom domain name Requirements 1-3 are easily satisfied by hugo. I also like the API of hugo, which I will go over in another post. Hugo also pretty simply supports rendering on github pages: https://gohugo.
